title: Average ticket price of the Los Angeles Chargers 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2007 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The line significantly increased by 114.55 from Year 2016 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2018.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 199.1 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 73.64 was reached at Year 2007
